processors.name: ironclust.sort

inputs.name: timeseries
inputs.description: The input raw timeseries in .mda format

inputs.name: geom
inputs.description: Optional geometry file in .csv or .prm format

parameters.name: samplerate
parameters.description: The sample rate of the input timeseries (Hz)

parameters.name: detect_sign
parameters.description: Indicates the sign of the spikes: -1, 0 or 1

parameters.name: adjacency_radius
parameters.description: Relates to the size of channel neighborhoods during sorting. Units should match with geom file.

parameters.name: prm_template_name
parameters.description: Name (string) representing a set of technical parameters. For example, 'tetrode'.

processors.exe_command: [needs to be wrapped in matlab call syntax] p_ironclust_sort('$timeseries$','$geom$','$prb$','$firings_out$','$(argfile)');
